Package CCDD

Class CcddDataTypeHandler

java.lang.Object
CCDD.CcddDataTypeHandler
public class CcddDataTypeHandler extends Object
CFS Command and Data Dictionary data type handler class

    • CcddDataTypeHandler

      CcddDataTypeHandler(List<String[]> dataTypes, CcddMain ccddMain)

      dataTypes - List of string arrays containing data type names and the corresponding data type definitions

      protected List<String> getDataTypeNames()
      Get a list of the data type names

    • getDataTypeDataArray

      protected Object[][] getDataTypeDataArray()
      Get the data type definitions as an object array. The object array allows preserving the column value's type (string, integer, etc.)
      Returns:
      Data type definitions as an object array

    • getDataTypeName

      protected static String getDataTypeName(String[] dataType)
      Get the data type name. Return the user-defined name unless it's blank, in which case return the C-language name
      Parameters:
      dataType - String array containing data type name and the corresponding data type definition
      Returns:
      User-defined data type name; if blank then the C-language name

    • getDataTypeName

      protected static String getDataTypeName(String userName, String cName)
      Get the data type name. Return the user-defined name unless it's blank, in which case return the C-language name
      Parameters:
      userName - User-defined data type name
      cName - C-language data type
      Returns:
      User-defined data type name; if blank then the C-language name

    • searchDataTypeReferences

      protected String[] searchDataTypeReferences(String dataTypeName, Component parent)
      Get a list containing the tables in the project database that reference the specified data type name. Only search for references in the prototype tables (any references in the custom values table are automatically updated when the prototype is changed)
      Parameters:
      dataTypeName - Data type name for which to search
      parent - GUI component over which to center any error dialog
      Returns:
      List containing the tables in the database that reference the specified data type name

    • updateDataTypes

      protected void updateDataTypes(List<String[]> dataTypeDefinitions, boolean replaceExistingDataTypes) throws CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException
      Add new data types and check for matches with existing ones
      Parameters:
      dataTypeDefinitions - List of data type definitions
      replaceExistingDataTypes - True if any existing data types that share a name with an imported one should be replaced
      Throws:
      CcddClassesDataTable.CCDDException - If an data type with the same same already exists and the imported type doesn't match

    • highlightSizeof

      protected static void highlightSizeof(Component component, String text, Color hightlightColor)
      Highlight any sizeof() calls in the the specified text component
      Parameters:
      component - Reference to the table cell renderer component
      text - Cell value
      hightlightColor - Color used for highlighting the sizeof() call

    • getDataTypePopUpItems

      protected List<String> getDataTypePopUpItems(boolean includePrimitives)
      Get the list of items to display in the data type pop-up combo box
      Parameters:
      includePrimitives - True to include primitive data types in the list; false to include only structures
      Returns:
      List of items to display in the data type pop-up combo box
